channel.title: mongodb on 🦁泽梅尔的驻留地
channel.description: Recent content in mongodb on 🦁泽梅尔的驻留地

item.title: 使用Docker运行MongoDB
item.description: Use Docker-Compose version: '3.1' services: mongo: image: mongo restart: always environment: MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_USERNAME: root MONGO_INITDB_ROOT_PASSWORD: example volumes: - db_store:/data/db ports: - 27017:27017 volumes: db_store: {}
